title: Nuffin Season
itunes:title: Nuffin Season
description:
As Charlamagne Tha God explores the idea of modern relationships in Western society, author and relationship expert Shan Boodram and academic scholar Reverend Michael Eric Dyson discuss traditional relationships versus alternative relationships.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
